cookingTips: Use very ripe bananas (with brown spots) for maximum sweetness and creaminess in the pudding
The avocado acts as a creamy binder and provides healthy fats; it won't be detectable in flavor
Serve immediately after blending for best texture; pudding will thicken slightly as it sits
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me make a quick chocolate pudding by blending ripe avocado, very ripe bananas, and cocoa powder until smooth and creamy.
